Job Title: Software Engineer - Back End Development - Python/django/restful API
Job Description: Role - Software Engineer - Back End   Technology: angularjs, angular 2+, html, css, javascript, jquery   Roles & responsibilities   - Developing Restful APIs and Services in Django Python.   - Design, develop and own components of the product.   - Collaborate with the team and communicate effectively, to solve problems and Build, extend, optimize and refactor the back-end architecture.   - Strengthen or improve development and release processes.    Required Candidate profileDesired Profile: - 1+ years work exp. in backend development. - B-tech from Tier 1Tier 2 institutes. - Being a pro in Python is a must. - Good experience in Django framework. - Proficient in NoSQL document databases especially MongoDB. - Strong hold in Data Structures and Algorithm - Good experience of working in Linux (especially Ubuntu). - An eye for Secure Applications. - Thorough understanding of version control system concepts especially GIT. - Experience in building highly scalable, robust, and fault tolerant services - Up-to date with the latest architectural trends - Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills .
Doctorate: Any Doctorate in Any Specialization, Doctorate Not Required
